JavaScript meets DRY

Documentation

  • Getting Started

    Get yourself familiar with the Folktale library by building a simple project in a couple of minutes.

  • Folktale By Example

    Dive into the concepts behind the Folktale library by working through a series of real world use-cases.

  • API Reference

    Quickly review information about the objects and operations in the Folktale library.

Related materials

  • A Monad in Practicality: First-Class Failures — a tutorial on using the Maybe, Either, and Validation algebraic structures to better handle exceptions in JavaScript.
  • A Monad in Practicality: Controlling Time — a tutorial on using the Future monad to deal with asynchronous operations in a higher-level, and composable way.
